participant_1.background:
I currently rent my home.
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.
i sleep in late during the day.
I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
i really like watching star trek.

participant_2.background:
I keep my students on their toes by keeping my lessons engaging and energetic.
i m in an education program , and hope to teach kindergarten when i graduate.
I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
i am overall happy with life.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Doing alright, just got back from a long run. What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm on my way to work.
I'm a teacher at a local elementary school.
Oh, that must be fun! What grade do you teach?
I'm a kindergarten teacher. I love working with young kids.
I bet that's a lot of fun! I'm not sure if I would be able to handle all the energy!
It can be a lot, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is! What do you do for fun in your free time?
I like to watch funny shows, spend time with my family, and go for walks.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies! I like to go for runs, watch Star Trek, and do odd jobs for people.
That's cool! I've never seen Star Trek, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a great show! I'm sure you'd like it.
I might have to check it out sometime.
